mapper.select: SELECT task_id AS taskId,user_id AS userId,type_id AS typeId,task_title AS taskTitle,task_content AS taskContent,task_start_time AS taskStartTime,task_end_time AS taskEndTime,task_state AS taskState,task_money AS taskMoney,supervisor_num AS supervisorNum,refund_money AS refundMoney,check_times AS checkTimes,check_frec AS checkFrec FROM task WHERE (user_id = #{userId} AND date(#{date}) between task_start_time and task_end_time)
